div.head: 下熱
div.div: heat in the lower [sections of the body]

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: heat in the lower [sections of the body]

sense.def: Pathological Condition of heat in the lower sections of the human body. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 6: 陰囊臭爛，坐 席厚，下熱故也 , “When the scrotum has a bad stench with putrefaction, this is because one has sat on a thick mat with heat in the lower [sections of the body]”. LSZ identifies the following major pathological conditions as signs of heat in the lower sections of the body: bao zhu xia po 暴注下迫 , sudden outpour with downward pressing; shui ye hun zhuo 水液渾濁 , turbidity of watery fluids; xia bu zhong man 下部腫滿 , distension and fullness in the lower body; xiao bian lin li huo bu tong 小便淋瀝或不通 , dripping urine or anuria; da bian bi jie xia li 大便閉結下痢 , constipation and discharge with free-flux illness.
